nodes.text: Karn's wife joined him in establishing a farm on the planet Muzara in 4000 BBY. Karn and his wife were joined by their daughter, Cavvie, Karn's brother-in-law Tallov Kersk, his wife, and their son, Vettle. The family became the first settlers from the Brentaal League to encounter the planet's native species, the Muza.
